function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic-induced uncertainty leading to increased incentives for automation","Impact":"Negative effects on aggregate demand, potential job loss, and reduced labor productivity","Mitigation":"Investing in job retraining programs, diversifying tasks to complement automation, and developing policies to support workforce transitions","Technologies":"Automation and robotics, virtual reality training, AI-based job matching platforms","People":"Workers at risk of job loss due to automation","Owner":"Government, companies, and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Health risks and reduced labor productivity due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Reduced efficiency, lower output, and potential job uncertainty","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible work arrangements, investing in remote work technologies, and promoting health and safety measures in the workplace","Technologies":"Remote work tools, communication software, health monitoring technology","People":"Workers in environments requiring physical presence","Owner":"Employers, government, and health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential cyber viruses affecting robots","Impact":"Disruption of automated processes, data breaches, and operational vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Implementing cybersecurity measures, regular software updates, and establishing secure communication protocols","Technologies":"Cybersecurity software, secure communication protocols, automated software update systems","People":"Technology experts, IT professionals, and organizations utilizing robotics","Owner":"IT departments, technology companies, and cybersecurity experts"}]}
